**Example 1: 大屏可视化紧急通知**

大屏可视化紧急通知

Input: 

```
tccli cwp DescribeScreenEmergentMsg --cli-unfold-argument ```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "MessageInfo": [
            {
                "Text": "xx",
                "Type": 1,
                "Title": "xx"
            }
        ],
        "RequestId": "xx"
    }
}
```
